author: Karoli
title: Has Any Candidate Noticed? The Investigative Storytellers Have Gone Missing
text:
sharethis 10/20/15 12:00pm Have we learned anything, gotten better, demanded more, lobbied for, pressed relentlessly for the media curtain of the ‘wizard' to be yanked back to expose the faux-facts fed to the public about the ‘condition our condition' is in nationally and internationally? Or is it biz as usual? Yes, Harper is overturned in Canada, the big shoulders… elections , investigative journalism , storytelling Comments
